summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 5.0°C) and outside temperature (down 4.6°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 728 m), and light levels (up 6354 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1675 m), and light levels (up 8271 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 727.9m lower than yesterday, 646.1m lower than the past week, 1674.9m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 1059m to a maximum of 3380m, averaging 996.3m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1642.4m and 2670m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, air moisture should feel ok. A few light raindrops may fall, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and a mix of sun and clouds. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
